Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to funds of the state
Summary: Relates to funds of the state; prohibits certain public authorities, commissions or public benefit corporations from depositing moneys in certain banking institutions.
LawCode: Add ยง2891, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to funds of the state
